abstract: The company reported quarterly sales of 600,000 phones, a decline of 100,000 from the previous period. It did not say how many were its Android model.
snippet: The company reported quarterly sales of 600,000 phones, a decline of 100,000 from the previous period. It did not say how many were its Android model.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — BlackBerry’s attempt to revive its once-mighty smartphone business by using Google’s Android operating system is off to a disappointing start.

headline.main: BlackBerry Falls Short in Attempt at Android-Based Revival
headline.print_headline: With a Focus on Android, BlackBerry Falls Short
